title: A Very Naughty Xmas
description:
Share Me (One Night with Sole Regret 0.5) by Olivia CunningLindsay longs for an amazing Christmas Eve with her favorite band, Sole Regret, and spends one snowy night with two generous rock stars who love to share their gifts.
Jingle Ball
 (also in A Taste of Decadence) by Cari QuinnThis Christmas, rocking the holiday office party has taken on a whole new meaning...Light Me Up (Ross Siblings #2.5) by Cherrie LynnShe's dreaming of a little sparkle in her stocking this year. He's planning a night that's anything but silent...
An Indecent Proposition Part I
 by Stephanie JulianTwo men. One Woman. Half a million dollars. A very indecent proposal...Christmas Is Coming by Raven MorrisThe best gifts are all tied up with bow...
author: Stephanie Julian
